$TSLA

$TSLA Xi just announced that China will ease restrictions on foreign car biz stake % in joint ventures - HUGE news for $tsla
$TSLA Chinese Premier just said:  "This year we will significantly reduce import tariffs for automobiles."  Yes, good news for Tesla.
$TSLA MARKETS will rally
$TSLA "CHINA WILL, THIS YEAR, LOWER IMPORT TARIFFS FOR AUTOMOBILES IN PARTICULAR" -President Xi

links.title: Live: President Xi's opening keynote at Boao 2018习近平在博鳌亚洲论坛2018年年会开幕式上发表主旨演讲
links.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping is delivering the opening keynote speech at the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2018 in Hainan Province. Foreign leaders including Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte, Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong and Pakistan's Prime Minister Shahid Khaqan Abbasi will attend the forum.

links.description: PDF NTSB chairman, Tesla CEO talk after fatal 'Autopilot' crash | Reuters 3 Min Read April 9 (Reuters) - The chairman of the National Transportation Safety Board and Tesla Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk had a "constructive conversation" on the agency's probe into a fatal crash involving a Tesla vehicle that was operating in semi-autonomous Autopilot mode, the agency said on Monday.
